The Communication Layer provides bidirectional MAVLink communication between ground control stations and vehicles. It implements a three-tier architecture:

This layer handles vehicle discovery, connection health monitoring, coordinate frame transformations, telemetry streaming, command routing, and RTCM correction forwarding. The architecture supports both remote vehicle control (ground station computes autopilot) and onboard autonomous operation (vehicle runs autopilot locally).
